MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G78 postcode area of Barrhead, affecting customers on Braeside Drive and surrounding areas. Engineershave identified a fault on our underground network on Bourbrock Square and are carrying out repairs and we still expect all power to be restored by 3am. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.22pm on the 1st February 2021.
